svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2024-06-25T19:42:16.911Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/23.0.2 Chrome/120.0.6099.109 Electron/28.1.0 Safari/537.36" etag="vrE--kHYPKJrGlGpcMTc" version="23.0.2" type="device" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="c4acf3e9-155e-7222-9cf6-157b1a14988f"> <mxGraphModel dx="2206" dy="1286" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1100" pageHeight="850" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="17acba5748e5396b-1" value="App window" style="shape=umlFrame;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=10;align=center;width=80;height=40;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="65" y="70" width="985" height="760" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-9" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5d2195bd80daf111-10" target="5d2195bd80daf111-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5d2195bd80daf111-10" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><i>UI</i><br><b>Interface</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ UI.font: pygame.font.SysFont('ubuntu', 20)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ UI.colors:</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span>'text': "white",<br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'text-value': "darkslategray4",&nbsp;</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'main-color': (30, 30, 30),</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'bg': "darkslategrey",</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'hovered': "darkslategray4",</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'not_hovered': "darkslategrey",</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'disabled': "gray60",&nbsp;</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 'clicked': "darkslategray4"</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ method1(Type): Type<br>+ method2(Type, Type): Type</p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="480" width="260" height="255" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-8" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5d2195bd80daf111-12" target="5d2195bd80daf111-15"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5d2195bd80daf111-12" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><i>Menu</i><br><b>Class</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ sliders: Array: Slider()<br>+ buttons: Array: Button()</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ labels: Array: Label()</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ object_labels: Array: Label()</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ run(self)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ moved_sliders(self): Bool</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ get_sliders_value(self): Array</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ get_buttons_value(self): Array</p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="220" width="260" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_YMPKC3000SZfKVww7V7-1" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="5d2195bd80daf111-18" target="5d2195bd80daf111-15" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5d2195bd80daf111-18" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><i>App</i><br><b>Class</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ maszt: Maszt()<br>+ window: Window()</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ update_maszt(self, new_param)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ window_display(self)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ ui_update(self)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ run(self)</p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="770" y="360" width="240" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_YMPKC3000SZfKVww7V7-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="_YMPKC3000SZfKVww7V7-8" target="17acba5748e5396b-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-2" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><i>args</i><br><b>From terminal</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">def arguments():<br></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- cam_disp</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- contour</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- detect</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- info</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- image: current_img</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- flip</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- width, height</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">- camera mode<br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1810" y="10" width="190" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-5" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=-0.006;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-2" target="_YMPKC3000SZfKVww7V7-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-6" value="" style="group" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1125" y="230" width="1050" height="610" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="_YMPKC3000SZfKVww7V7-8" value="Maszt interface" style="shape=umlFrame;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=10;align=center;width=115;height=40;" parent="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-6" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="1050" height="610" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5d2195bd80daf111-9" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><i>Utils</i><br><b>static class</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ image parameters:&nbsp;</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">threshold1, threshold2, min_area, max_area,&nbsp;</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">brigtness_v, contrast_v,</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">lower_color, upper_color, exposure</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ masking(img, lower, upper): return masked_img<br>+ get_contours(img, c_thr, contrast, brightness): return image, erode</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ detect_square(self, model_image, final_image, min_area, max_area, object_w, object_l)</span><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ display_info(final_image, contour)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ pick_object(contours): return maszt.detected_object</p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;"><br></p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ approx_length(rect, object_w, object_l): return w, l, dist</p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ approx_color(img, x, y, w, h): return closest_color, fit</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ print_param(self)</p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1" parent="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-6" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="290" width="490" height="290" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5d2195bd80daf111-11" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><i>Devices</i><br><b>Class</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ from jetcam.csi_camera import CSICamera</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ init_camera(self, exposure=0.0): return CSICamera</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ prepare_devices(self, cam_disp): return cam, vid, images_a<br>+ method2(Type, Type): Type</p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1" parent="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-6" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="620" y="290" width="410" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5d2195bd80daf111-19" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><i>Maszt</i><br><b>Interface</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ image: cv2 object frame with final processed image<br>+ image_contour: cv2 object frame with threshold</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+detected_object: array with information about picked object</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ start()</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ close()</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ update_image_param(self, param)<br>+ update_image_exposure(self, exp_value)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ set_exposure(self, value)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ get_current_img(self)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ get_info(self): Array - info about image parameters</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ get_object_info(self): Array - return image_contour</p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1" parent="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-6" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="20" width="360" height="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-3" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.25;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-6" source="5d2195bd80daf111-9" target="5d2195bd80daf111-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-4" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-6" source="5d2195bd80daf111-11" target="5d2195bd80daf111-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5d2195bd80daf111-15" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><i>Window</i><br><b>Class</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ UI.init(self)<br>+ menu: Menu()</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ display_window(self)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ display_frame(self, frame, pos_x, pos_y)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ update_info(self, maszt_info, object_info)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ moved_sliders(self): Bool</p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ get_sliders_value(self)</p><p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ get_buttons_value(self)</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">@staticmethod</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ update()</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ event_handler()</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="220" width="260" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ugKVhDRrjZUBbU3lZ7YY-10" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.999;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="5d2195bd80daf111-18" target="17acba5748e5396b-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

+ masking(img, lower, upper): return masked_img
+ get_contours(img, c_thr, contrast, brightness): return image, erode

p.span: + detect_square(self, model_image, final_image, min_area, max_area, object_w, object_l)

div.p: + approx_length(rect, object_w, object_l): return w, l, dist
+ approx_color(img, x, y, w, h): return closest_color, fit

+ prepare_devices(self, cam_disp): return cam, vid, images_a

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 362px; height: 230px; padding-top: 240px; margin-left: 1400px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; width: 360px; height: 230px; overflow: hidden;

div.p:
+ image: cv2 object frame with final processed image
+ image_contour: cv2 object frame with threshold
+detected_object: array with information about picked object
+ get_info(self): Array - info about image parameters

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 262px; height: 260px; padding-top: 210px; margin-left: 375px;
